Hero.casossucesso: Take a look at some projects
Hero.sobre1: I am a Quality Analyst specializing in test automation, with over 3 years of experience at one of the largest software houses in Latin America.
Hero.sobre2: Currently, I specialize in Robot Framework and Selenium, working with both manual and automated testing across a variety of products, languages, and platforms. I also lead the automation team, where I am responsible for making strategic decisions, setting goals, and regularly reporting results to our leadership.
Hero.sobre3: I believe that a strong quality culture is one of the most important pillars in the software development lifecycle. I am always seeking ways to increase the reliability of our deliveries and ensure that the products meet the expectations of our users.

IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: next-intl example

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
